To install the agent please follow the: To install the agent please follow the
Installing the agent is requiring local: Installing the agent is requiring local administrator privileges.
You can whether directly copy and paste: You can whether directly copy and paste the following Powershell snippet in an elevated prompt or download the .ps1 script (and execute it as an administrator).
You can whether directly copy and paste the following bash snippet in a root console or download the .sh script (and execute it as root).
For the moment, the following snippet or: For the moment, the following snippet or script will not add the agent at boot. Please be sure to add it in rc.local or other files to make it persistent. We will release proper packages in the near future.
The agent will never execute directly an: The agent will never execute directly any payload.
You will need to add proper antivirus ex: You will need to add proper antivirus exclusions for this agent (to ensure Caldera injects execution to work properly). It may not be necessary in the future but this is generally a good practice to ensure the agent will be always available.
